title: Facebook Messenger Debt Tracker Bot
description:
Complete implementation of a Facebook Messenger bot for personal debt tracking.

## Features:
- Add Debt: 'no/nợ [amount] [content]'
- Repay Debt: 'tra/trả [amount] [content]'
- Check Debt: 'check', 'tong', 'show no'
- Help: 'help'

## Tech Stack:
- Node.js + Express
- google-spreadsheet v4 (Service Account)
- Render deployment ready

## Files:
- index.js, package.json, .env.example, README.md, .gitignore
